overview: In two intertwining narratives, a migrant worker alternates between different realities. In the first, depicted through a rapid montage of black-and-white photographs, he explores a film prop warehouse, reciting and rehearsing old tales and traditional texts. The second, shown in languid colour footage, reveals the same workerâ€™s daily routines, his return to his hometown, and a deadly act of revenge.
title: Smoke and Fire
